bannerText.stepDescription: Click ‘Become a member’ button to proceed.
Click ‘Close’ button, find and click wine in the list of products.
Click ‘Promotion Products’ tab, 2nd item in the main menu.
Click ‘Rewards’ tab, 6th item in the main menu.
Click ‘Chat’ tab, 7th item in the main menu.
Click ‘To Do List’ tab, 4th item in the main menu.
Click ‘History’ tab, 5th item in the main menu.
Click ‘Log Out’ tab, the last one in the main menu.
